title: Kimono, 1900–1950
medium:
Medium: ramie
Technique: tied-resist dying in warp and weft (kasuri) on plain weave
description: Woman's summer kimono dyed dark indigo blue with tied resist patterning in warp and weft forming a design in white of checks and flowers.
